site.description: jSSTL is a Java tool for the specification and verification of SSTL. This tool, developed in Java, consists of a Java library (jSSTL API) and a front-end, integrated in ECLIPSE.

category-def.name: jsstl
category-def.label: jSSTL (1.0.x)
category-def.description: jSSTL is a Java tool for the specification and verification of SSTL. This tool, developed in Java, consists of a Java library (jSSTL API) and a front-end, integrated in ECLIPSE.
